name: Garlock Seafoods
address: Garlock Seafoods, 252 E Georgia St, Vancouver, BC V6A 1Z6

featured_reviews.review_id: Got 1 crab 1 lobster. Crab was huge and fresh. Lobster was not. Lady was super sweet. Price was decent, worth it for the crab but not lobster.
featured_reviews.review_text: Got 1 crab 1 lobster. Crab was huge and fresh. Lobster was not. Lady was super sweet. Price was decent, worth it for the crab but not lobster.

featured_reviews.review_id: Been here multiple times and the fish they have in stock is always very fresh and affordable. They do a good job at cleaning the fish for you after you select the one you would like. Definitely would recommend frequenting this mom and pop store over the grocery conglomerates
featured_reviews.review_text: Been here multiple times and the fish they have in stock is always very fresh and affordable. They do a good job at cleaning the fish for you after you select the one you would like. Definitely would recommend frequenting this mom and pop store over the grocery conglomerates

featured_reviews.review_id: They have a variety of seafood and prices are reasonable. Staff here are friendly and always welcoming. They will cut the fish however you like and will ask if you want to keep the bones. The black cod that I get from them is always fresh and typically at a good price. The prices do fluctuate but compared to other places, I find they're the most reasonable.
featured_reviews.review_text: They have a variety of seafood and prices are reasonable. Staff here are friendly and always welcoming. They will cut the fish however you like and will ask if you want to keep the bones. The black cod that I get from them is always fresh and typically at a good price. The prices do fluctuate but compared to other places, I find they're the most reasonable.

featured_reviews.review_id: I don't shop here bc I'm vegan but I support small Chinatown businesses since I grew up in Chinatown. It saddens me to see it in this state. However, I'm happy to see that non-Chinese shoppers patronize places like this. TYVM! I even heard one of the workers speak in fairly good English to the White Euro looking shoppers. These shoppers seem satisfied with their purchases. Please keep Chinatown businesses going by choosing to shop here than in T&T or in other places. Come explore Chinatown, experiment with products that you can buy here n with all of our help, hopefully Chinatown businesses will come back to their former glory . I'd love that...
featured_reviews.review_text: I don't shop here bc I'm vegan but I support small Chinatown businesses since I grew up in Chinatown. It saddens me to see it in this state. However, I'm happy to see that non-Chinese shoppers patronize places like this. TYVM! I even heard one of the workers speak in fairly good English to the White Euro looking shoppers. These shoppers seem satisfied with their purchases. Please keep Chinatown businesses going by choosing to shop here than in T&T or in other places. Come explore Chinatown, experiment with products that you can buy here n with all of our help, hopefully Chinatown businesses will come back to their former glory . I'd love that...

featured_reviews.review_id: Favourite Seafood Shop in British Columbia. Lots of fresh fish and seafood options and you can choose which fish or crab you would like to buy. The prices for the seafood is a lot cheaper than if you were to go to TNT and the quality and freshness of the seafood is incomparable. The quality is amazing and I'm surprised by how juicy my lobster and black cod was. Highly recommend!
featured_reviews.review_text: Favourite Seafood Shop in British Columbia. Lots of fresh fish and seafood options and you can choose which fish or crab you would like to buy. The prices for the seafood is a lot cheaper than if you were to go to TNT and the quality and freshness of the seafood is incomparable. The quality is amazing and I'm surprised by how juicy my lobster and black cod was. Highly recommend!

featured_reviews.review_id: My family's favorite seafood store in Vancouver Chinatown. We would stop by here to buy fish whenever we are in Chinatown.  I know there are plenty of other seafood stores in Metro Vancouver.  Their prices are very competitive and you can select the live fish you want to buy.  Other fish stores doesn't allow you to select the fish you want.  The smell of fish doesn't please everyone nor is the sight as well.  This seafood store have a variety of seafood such as fresh fish, live fish, dungeness crab , Atlantic lobsters, fresh clams and oysters.

featured_reviews.review_id: Great Fresh fish and other seafood. Always a good price. Lobsters, crabs, clams, and also you have various fish like ling cod, salmom or other fish that you get from Asian supermarkets.
featured_reviews.review_text: Great Fresh fish and other seafood. Always a good price. Lobsters, crabs, clams, and also you have various fish like ling cod, salmom or other fish that you get from Asian supermarkets.

featured_reviews.review_id: Their sashimi grade salmon is great. The oysters and shrimp here were amazing too!! And price was cheap!
featured_reviews.review_text: Their sashimi grade salmon is great. The oysters and shrimp here were amazing too!! And price was cheap!
